column4: I am having trouble starting dansguardian.  I get this error ... Error binding server socket (is something else running on the filter port and ip? [8080 192.168.6.200])  How do I see what else is using port 8080?
you are running it as root/with sudo? -  (other then that - i got no clue)
sure you havent accidently ran it twice?
